name: Galaxy Shooter (JokingJester1)
description:
How To Play

  • WASD to move
  • Hold left shift to move faster. Does consume stamina
  • Press the spacebar to shoot
  • Press C to Attract Powerups. Is on a 8 second cooldown
  • A new enemy type will spawn each wave
  • Survive 5 waves

Tip: For wave 3 with the blue enemies, try to get extremely close to them and shoot them so they can't dodge the laser shot.

Github for this project: 

: JokingJester/Galaxy-Shooter-Certification: GameDevHQ Galaxy Shooter Game with Certification Requirements met (github.com)

Now stop reading and start playing
